name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 20, Nehe, Heilongjiang. The local New Rural Cooperative Medical Cooperative Society collapsed and ran away. The depositors knelt down in front of the Nehe Municipal Government to ask for their hard-earned money.
One of the depositors appealed: If the government does not solve the problem, I will bring a truck of poison tomorrow and commit suicide in front of the municipal government. We must believe that Beijing will come forward to solve it. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894779302484287489/pu/img/Pxiin18NkZgf0wOw.jpg

The local Wahaha factory laid off employees, and the laid-off old employees came to the factory to demand their wages and rights, while the chairman Zong Fuli sat in the office leisurely drinking tea. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894781620860911616/pu/img/Kd54QdJO-mAac5is.jpg

content: On February 26, Xinjiang held a work conference in southern Xinjiang, which emphasized that we must always put stability maintenance first, establish bottom-line thinking and extreme thinking, and always tighten the string of anti-terrorism and stability maintenance. "We must deepen the legalization and normalization of anti-terrorism and stability maintenance" "Strengthen overall social prevention and control, and strictly prevent the risk of imported terrorist attacks" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkunEshXIAAkpoS.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 26 (Released) Several men landed in Cairo, Egypt. The airport ground staff greeted them enthusiastically. The man thought that China had done a lot of construction for Egypt and thought that the other party wanted to give him special treatment. As a result, the ground staff asked them for tips. The man and his group refused and were retaliated by the airport staff. They waited a long time before getting their luggage.
Netizens commented: "Didn't you tell him about the box office of Nezha 2?" "Did you tell him that we have 6th generation fighters" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894795618985394176/pu/img/mExAPHjr1v399cw_.jpg

content:
On February 26, the Supreme People's Procuratorate: Severely punish "one person killing multiple people", especially major vicious crimes of revenge against society, in accordance with the law.
Some bloggers said that it is not enough to just punish severely. As long as judicial fairness and justice are guaranteed and the people can truly feel the justice of the judiciary, then most of the "revenge crimes against society" will be directly resolved in the bud. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkuuEKWXwAAcTf9.jpg

content:
February 26 (Release) In 2011, the Yihefang property in Xi'an was put on sale. As the price was lower than the surrounding properties, it attracted many owners to buy. However, the property was eventually abandoned due to the developer's insolvency. In 2022, hundreds of owners moved into the unfinished building, including newly married couples and elderly people who emptied their savings to get their son married....
One owner said, "I just want to give my daughter a good living environment. What's wrong with me?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894832796922978305/pu/img/d8RRctK3M8br7FA2.jpg

content: February 26, Zhejiang. A breakfast shop owner complained that he was able to make a profit during the epidemic, but in the past two years, it has been even worse than during the epidemic. Look at such a wide road, there are few people. Where have all the people gone? I don’t understand why the business has been so bad in the past two years. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894978088188178432/pu/img/3ycZVmFem_PF1osC.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was revealed that Tao Piaopiao had set up a scheduled Weibo post for the 24th: "As of February 24, the box office of the film "Operation Jiaolong" has exceeded 700 million yuan." Unexpectedly, the film was withdrawn. As of now, it has only taken 389 million yuan in box office and 7.775 million people watched it, but Tao Piaopiao forgot to remove the scheduled Weibo post, which led to a big mistake on Tao Piaopiao on the 24th. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkyCQkYXIAAlZyZ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Trump said at a cabinet meeting, "Is anyone unhappy with Musk? If so, we'll kick them out." Musk said he thought Trump "formed the best cabinet ever." Trump also said that he had decided to impose a 25% tariff on the EU, which would apply to cars and various other goods. Trump also said that the EU "took advantage of the United States" and "refused to accept American cars and agricultural products" for various reasons. There is a trade deficit of about "US$300 billion" between the United States and the EU, and that the purpose of the establishment of the EU was to "bring down" the United States.

"Office workers don't even have two days off a week." Some parents also said they would complain to the Education Bureau. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkyOHKXaoAM9xAc.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 26, a blogger named "Xiaofuzi" who teaches junior high school students how to write essays said that negative energy can be written in exam essays, but it must not involve politics, such as: social corruption, school bullying, school rotten meat, etc. Negative energy in essays is limited to small troubles in growing up, and the final destination must be positive energy. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895049047754579971/pu/img/2sV9Ulrum3ZEuFfn.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: For the second time this year, the Philippines has captured Chinese and Filipino individuals suspected of collecting intelligence for China. The Philippine National Bureau of Investigation said that recently a number of suspicious cars carrying "international mobile user identification code receivers" have frequently appeared near some important departments in the Greater Manila area, including the presidential palace, the US Embassy, and several military camps. The Philippines arrested three Filipino suspects and then arrested two Chinese nationals involved with them. One of the Filipino suspects told the media that since October last year, he has been hired to drive his accomplices around Manila and open the "boxes" containing the equipment, with a daily reward of about US$52.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A group of Uighurs who have been detained in Thailand for more than a decade may have been deported back to China.
48 Uighurs have been detained in Thailand for a decade after escaping from China. On February 27, according to multiple media reports, several cars drove away from the Bangkok Immigration Center where the 48 Uighurs were detained early this morning, with black tape on their windows.
A few hours later, according to data from Flightradar24, a global flight tracking application, a previously unscheduled China Southern Airlines flight took off from Bangkok's Don Muang Airport at 5:48 a.m. and landed in Kashgar, Xinjiang, about 6 hours later.
Chinese state media reported that 40 Chinese illegal immigrants were repatriated from Thailand today.
The Thai Immigration Police, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs and its embassy in Bangkok did not immediately respond to requests for comment.
United Nations human rights experts urged Thailand last month not to deport the 48 Uighurs to China, warning that if...
fullContent:
一群在泰国被拘留十多年的维吾尔族人可能已被驱逐回中国。
 有48名维吾尔人逃出中国后被拘留在泰国长达十年，2月27日，据多家媒体媒体报道，今天凌晨，数辆汽车驶离关押这48名维吾尔人的曼谷移民中心，车窗上贴满了黑色胶带。
 几个小时后，根据全球航班追踪应用程式Flightradar24数据，一架先前未预定的中国南方航空航班在凌晨5时48分从曼谷廊曼机场起飞，约6小时后降落在新疆喀什。
 中国官媒则报道称，今天40名中国籍偷渡人员从泰国被遣返回国。
 泰国移民警察局、中国外交部及其驻曼谷大使馆没有立即回应置评请求。
 联合国人权专家曾在上个月敦促泰国，不要将这48名维吾尔人遣返至中国，并警告说，如果遭遣返，他们将面临遭受酷刑、虐待和「无法弥补的伤害」的风险。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Blogger "Yulie Qige" who once exposed the illegal discharge of sewage in many places in China said that because exposing water pollution has affected many people's interests, he had to buy insurance for his own safety.
"Yulie Qige" said that those who exposed gutter oil, melamine milk powder, and counterfeiting basically had no good end. I myself have also been under great pressure and often received anonymous private threats. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895073009272053761/pu/img/N4RRL9eQtx02GB5C.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A French guy claimed to have hundreds of photos of "Japanese atrocities in China". After gaining attention and traffic from China, it was revealed that the photos were fake.
Previously, Evan Kyle, the owner of a pawn shop in the United States, donated photos of the Japanese invasion of China during World War II to China, which attracted a lot of attention.
Recently, another French guy, Marcus, claimed to be a descendant of a family of victims of the Japanese invasion of China. His grandfather took hundreds of photos recording "Japanese atrocities" in Shanghai in the last century. He decided to donate the photos to the Shanghai Songhu Anti-Japanese War Memorial.
After Marcus came to China, he was sought after and loved by the majority of netizens. Even official media such as CCTV competed to report his deeds, and his Douyin account also gained more than 400,000 fans.
However, just recently, someone pointed out that many of the photos shown by Marcus had been published in Chinese and foreign media earlier, and the photographers were other people, not Marcus' grandfather.
The Shanghai Songhu Anti-Japanese War Memorial responded: It is still under appraisal, and the results...
fullContent:
法国小伙称手握数百张“日军侵华暴行”照片，收获中国关注和流量后，被人扒出照片有假。
 此前，美国一典当行老板 埃文·凯尔 将二战日军侵华照片捐赠给中国，收获了不少关注。
 近日，又有一个法国小伙马库斯自称是日军侵华受害者家族的后代，其祖父上世纪在上海拍摄了数百张记录“日军暴行”的照片，他决定将照片捐赠给上海淞沪抗战纪念馆。
 马库斯到中国后受到广大网民的追捧和热爱。就连央视等官媒也竞相报道他的事迹，其抖音账号也收获了40余万的粉丝。
 然而就在近日，有人指出马库斯展示的照片中，有很多照片早前就在中外媒体发表过，并且拍摄者都另有其人，并非马库斯的祖父拍摄。
上海淞沪抗战纪念馆回应：尚在鉴定，结果未出炉。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 26 (Release) A woman reported her husband, Xu Duo, an associate professor of biology at Shandong Medical University, under her real name, that he had an affair with a female college student three months after she gave birth, but her boss covered up for her and did nothing. The woman said, "I had just given birth to my child three months ago, and he brought his mistress in." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895080956865978368/pu/img/ZDx_HJ3_E_XUXRtB.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 20, Huairen, Shanxi. That night, a man drove a crane and rammed a car parked on the roadside for no reason, and drove away, causing damage to many cars.
A car owner said that the driver drove the crane in the opposite direction from Beilijiao to the vicinity of Hetou intersection, ramming cars all the way, and then fled. The driver was suspected to have mental problems. Some car owners who stole the crane did not know who to find to accompany their cars after they were smashed and scrapped. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895084416554409985/pu/img/3TYlgB_sfJ6M_Lr7.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Mercedes-Benz China reportedly started layoffs yesterday, with a layoff rate of about 15%. In addition to N+9 compensation, if the laid-off employees do not join a new company in the next two months, Mercedes-Benz will also pay them additional wages for March and April, which is equivalent to a maximum compensation of N+11.
Netizens said: "In China, N+1 is out of reach, and N+9 is unexpected. Mercedes-Benz is disrupting the market" "Beware of foreign sugar-coated bullets" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gky1j4UXsAAbd90.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, blogger "Feng Ge Fuming Tianya" talked about his experience of traveling in South Korea: Everyone asked me to take some photos of the miserable life in South Korea, and I really tried my best to find them, but the income of the bottom class in South Korea is not low. Waiters make 2.8 million, porters make 3 million, and welders make 5 million. The blue-collar workers who do the dirtier and more tiring work actually make higher incomes...
Then this post was deleted by the platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gky7eFnaoAciUn0.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Bloomberg: U.S. Secretary of State Rubio says the U.S. can’t let Russia become China’s “little partner”
Rubio recently said in an exclusive interview with conservative media Breitbart News that the Trump administration hopes to downplay the relationship between the two nuclear powers, China and Russia, without causing division.
“I don’t know if we can completely succeed in getting them (Russia) out of their relationship with China. I also don’t think it’s good for global stability to make China and Russia irreconcilable because they are both nuclear countries.”
Rubio warned that if Moscow becomes Beijing’s “eternal little partner” and the two nuclear powers confront Washington together, it will not be a good thing for the United States.
In the interview, Rubio described the U.S.-China relationship as a “major event of the 21st century” and said that Washington will have differences and confrontations with both Beijing and Moscow, but stressed that it is important to maintain relations with these two countries.
“These are big and powerful countries with nuclear arsenals. They can be in the whole world...
fullContent:
彭博社：美国国务卿卢比奥称，美国不能让俄罗斯成为中国的“小伙伴”
 卢比奥近日接受保守派媒体布莱巴特新闻网专访时表示，特朗普政府希望在不造成分裂的情况下淡化中俄这两个核大国之间的关系。
 “我不知道我们是否能完全成功地让他们（俄罗斯）脱离与中国的关系。我也不认为让中国和俄罗斯势不两立有利于全球稳定，因为他们都是核国家。”
 卢比奥警告说，如果莫斯科成为北京“永远的小伙伴”，两个核大国一起对抗华盛顿，那对美国也不是好事。
 鲁比奥在采访中将美中关系描述为“21世纪的大事”，并称华盛顿与北京和莫斯科都会有分歧和对抗，但强调与这两个国家保持关系很重要。
“这些都是拥有核武库的大国和强国。他们可以在全球投射力量。我觉得在外交关系中我们已经失去成熟和理智的概念。”

content: On February 27, Chinese Defense Ministry spokesman Wu Qian warned the DPP authorities: "If you try to stop a chariot with your bare hands, you will only bring about your own destruction. Sooner or later, we will come to take you away." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkzDatvXMAEDM5Z.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Media "A Detached House": Starting from 2021, in just three years, the faith in China's real estate market collapsed, demand and financing were halved, and housing prices in many places generally fell by 30%
Data shows: Compared with July 2021, as of the end of 24, real estate investment fell by 33.4%, sales area fell by 49.8%, financing fell by 49.4%, and housing prices fell by 38%
This is a unique event in the history of China's real estate, and it is rare in the human real estate cycle https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkzKlDTXgAAtxyY.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 25, the voice actor of Nezha 2, "Tu Qi", sued the dubbing company "Chengdu Shengyu Culture Communication Company". Tu Qi said that during the trainee period, he did not have five insurances and one fund, and his monthly salary was 2,000 yuan. He was fired four months after becoming a regular employee. "In the first month before joining the company, the salary was only more than three yuan. For more than two years, I have been working at a loss." Shengyu Culture: We will not respond to this matter for the time being. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895121306560929792/pu/img/hJfSFsVQYDep-A_s.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: 71-year-old Dong Mingzhu wants to work for another three years. Dong Mingzhu was nominated as a director of Gree Electric and is expected to work for another three years. She was previously criticized by netizens: "It's time to step down." On the evening of February 24, Gree Electric announced the list of nominees for the 13th board of directors. Dong Mingzhu and others became non-independent director candidates. If nothing unexpected happens, Dong Mingzhu will start a new term in Gree Electric. Dong Mingzhu has served as the chairman of Gree Electric since 2012. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkzXqfRaoAA0tS4.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The 6214 Hospital in Ruichang, Jiangxi, was reported to have ceased operations due to serious losses. It is reported that the hospital has a history of more than 50 years and is quite famous locally. Hospital staff responded that the announcement was true and the hospital officially ceased operations on the 27th. More than 60 employees left their jobs or sought other ways to make a living, and the patients were transferred to other hospitals.
On January 5, Sanlian Life Weekly published an article on its WeChat public account saying that when searching for "hospitals" on the National Enterprise Bankruptcy and Reorganization Case Information Network, there were more than 1,200 records related to hospital bankruptcy in 2024, and more than 800 and 500 in 2023 and 2022 respectively.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
South Korean media: North Korea sent troops to the Russian-Ukrainian battlefield again in February this year. About 1,000 to 3,000 North Korean soldiers arrived at the Kursk front on Russian cargo ships and military aircraft, and additional mechanized infantry, engineers, and electronic reconnaissance troops were sent. 
Last October, 11,000 North Korean troops were sent to the Kursk battlefield, of which more than 4,000 were killed or wounded. Russia had requested to transfer the remains of North Korean soldiers, but was rejected by North Korea. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkzglLdXMAEpOE2.jpg
